Objectives: Seeking internships or full-time positions as a hardware/software engineer in AI, embedded systems, or computer systems manufacturing industries with a focus on sustainability, creative design, and positive change.

Education.Degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Projects.Title: 7-bit Parallel Multiplier ASIC Design
Projects.Description: Developed a multiplier using 5nm transistor technology within a 900um x 900um area using custom transistor gate layouts.

Projects.Title: Audio Recorder Design
Projects.Description: Designed an audio recorder with control features on a Spartan-6 board using DDR2 RAM, I2C protocol, and picoBlaze microcontroller. Conducted simulation test benches and formal verification.

Projects.Title: Coin Detection Script
Projects.Description: Achieved 97.81% classification accuracy using Hough Transform, SVM, and HSV profiling for coin detection.

Projects.Title: Object Matching Script
Projects.Description: Utilized SIFT Detector with RANSAC for object matching under occlusion scenarios, producing bounding boxes.

Projects.Title: Fingerprint Classification Using GCN
Projects.Description: Applied SMOTE and created a Graph Convolution Network achieving 86.5% accuracy.

Projects.Title: Other Projects
Projects.Description: Unix Shell (C), Semi-Autonomous Robot (Arduino), Vending Machine Simulator (Verilog), Digital Camera Blueprint, Personal Private Network (Belize-Tampa).
